import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../../navbar/Navbar' import { Card, Button, Image, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import myProfileIcon from '../../../../images/icons/ManageUsersButton.png' import myPlanIcon from '../../../../images/icons/MyPlanIcon.svg' import createPostIcon from '../../../../images/icons/CreatePostButton.svg' import Profile from './Profile' import Plan from './Plan' import CreatePost from './CreatePost' import SearchBar from '../../../SearchBar' const ManageAccount = () => { const [profileBtnVar, setProfileBtnVar] = useState('danger') const [planBtnVar, setPlanBtnVar] = useState('light') const [postBtnVar, setPostBtnVar] = useState('light') function handleButtonClick(button) { setProfileBtnVar('light') setPlanBtnVar('light') setPostBtnVar('light') if (button === 'profile') setProfileBtnVar('danger') if (button === 'myplan') setPlanBtnVar('danger') if (button === 'post') setPostBtnVar('danger') } return (

My Account
{profileBtnVar === 'danger' &&
} {planBtnVar === 'danger' &&
} {postBtnVar === 'danger' &&
}
) } export default ManageAccount
